oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Expeditious synthesis of bacterial, rare sugar building blocks to access the prokaryotic glycome
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: EMMADI, M
KULKARNI, SS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: DE-NOVO SYNTHESIS
STREPTOCOCCUS-PNEUMONIAE
LINKED BACILLOSAMINE
C-POLYSACCHARIDE
SHIGELLA-SONNEI
D-FUCOSAMINE
NITRITE
SUBSTITUTION
GLUCOSAMINE
DERIVATIVES
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bacteria have unusual glycans which are not accessible by isolation. Herein, we describe a general and divergent strategy for the synthesis of the rare, bacterial deoxy amino hexopyranoside building blocks from D-mannose. The methodology is applied to the first total synthesis of the L-serine linked trisaccharide of Neisseria meningitidis.
